python-pip
python-pyqt5
python-pyqtwebengine

qt5-wayland
wayland
libxkbcommon
gcc
make
cmake
git
wget
curl
xdg-utils
libx11
libxrandr
libxinerama
libxcursor
libxi
# Packages from README

wine-staging
zenity
tk
wmctrl
# AUR package
limitcpu
